name: John Kribo
message: I was impressed how fast the content is loaded. Congratulations. nice design.

message: It’s Simple, Clean & Nice .. Good work Dear .. GLWS

name: Clara Wati
message: Great work! Do you have any plans to add loading indicators for AJAX calls that might take longer than normal?

message: I am very interested in the theme and I’m thinking about buying it.

message: Hi! First of all, thank you for the very nice theme for creating awesome web applications :)
